channel.title: Soup on Cookbook
channel.description: Recent content in Soup on Cookbook

item.title: Chili
item.description: Ingredients 1 pound ground beef 1 onion, diced 1 pepper, diced 2 cloves garlic, minced 4 x 8 ounce cans tomato sauce 1 can black beans 1 can kidney beans 2 tablespoons chili powder 1 teaspoon cumin 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper Directions brown ground beef combine all ingredients and cook over medium heat
